website_summaries.verdict: An attractive look that's ideal for summer wear, but it's not as versatile as some others on our list and not practical for everyone.
pros: Ultra-feminine off-shoulder style with flowing material
Nice length on both tall and short ladies
cons: The arm holes fit tightly on some wearers
The split may be too high for women who don't want too show a lot of leg

customer_reviews.title: I loved it, it fit me great and I was ...
customer_reviews.text: I used this dress for my 25th anniversary, I loved it, it fit me great and I was perfect for the ocassion
customer_reviews.author: avejita

customer_reviews.title: Great "beach" dress!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful dress! I wore it for my beach engagement pictures and it was everything I hoped for! I got a size medium and the fit and length was perfect. The slip underneath was a little short for me- I'm 5' 7". The dress flowed so nicely!
customer_reviews.author: Holly Bronko

customer_reviews.title: Buy this dress!
customer_reviews.text: This dress is absolutely adorable! It's very flattering on, and very flowy! For the price, the quality surpasses expectations. With that being said, the slit does come up a bit high and can pose to be a problem, but there is a slip underneath to be a back up, cover-up! I'm 5'4, 110 pounds and a small fit well, with room to spare.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lozano

customer_reviews.title: Loved this dress
customer_reviews.text: Loved this dress! I am 5'9 and athletic build. I bought an XL to make sure it was long enough and not too tight in the arms. Super comfortable! I recommend this dress for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: I love this little dress. I honestly thought it would be more of a maxi dress all around and not so open in the front but I don't mind it. I'm 5'6 and the length of the liner should be fine without having to wear another layer underneath. I Usually wear size XL or 16ish, heavy in the hips, and bought the XL, it fits great and is flowy. I'd definitely recommend it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: ash johnson

customer_reviews.title: Super cute dress but might need repairs.
customer_reviews.text: Super cute dress that I can dress up or dress down. The sleeve tore a bit (see images) and I had to fix it so that's why I gave it 4 stars instead of 5. It's a bit scratchy, too, but I just wear an invisible bra underneath and I'm just fine. For reference, I'm 5'1" and fluctuate between 145 and 160 pounds.
customer_reviews.author: AmarantinePhotographyTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Great for engagement photos!
customer_reviews.text: Wore this dress for my engagement photos and I liked the way it photographed! I am 5’3 and 110 lb and I got the small. I would say the dress was slightly loose on me, but luckily the style helped to hide that pretty well. The liner is definitely on the shorter side, but with my height it still worked fine. I’m happy with it overall!
customer_reviews.author: Devon B

customer_reviews.title: Pretty dress
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful dress. I'm happy the product looked how I imagined it. I got a medium, but I should've gotten a small so the top would be a little tighter. Nonetheless it still looks pretty good. If y'all are under 5'5 (I'm 5,3), some kind of heel is need for this dress.
customer_reviews.author: Aileen

customer_reviews.title: Large breasted ladies: this dress can work for you
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'8" and wear size S, 4 or 27 in pants. I ordered a Large dress, but think XL would've fit better. I'm a 32DD and do not wear strapless bras. But I loved this print and wanted the dress. Here's what I did: 1. Removed all thin elastic from the sleeves, leaving elastic only on the seams. 2. Removed the sleeves 3. Reattached the sleeves in a way that'd cover my bra straps. 4. Removed the slip (it's VERY short and see through) and attached the bottom of a white tee shirt instead. Voila. All did not use a sweing machine and stitched everything by hand. It took me a couple of hours.
customer_reviews.author: George F

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful dress, worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for my baby announcement photos. I loved it and it looked as expected! I did not have any see through issues! The slip underneath was a little short and would ride up when I would sit or bend over or anything of the like, but that still wasn't bothersome overall and probably could've been fixed or lessened if I ordered one size up, but as you can see, this size was just fine as well! Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Lewy

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and affordable
customer_reviews.text: Went based off of what other reviewers said for my size selection. I'm 200lbs and 5'10" 38dd and chose the XL which is what I would've grabbed if I was buying in a store. My arms are large but the sleeve stretched nicely and didn't look too overly stretched to fit. Wish it was a tad longer, but not terrible for being a taller woman. Fabric seems thin but isn't see through, not sure how easy it'll be to wash but we shall find out. No strong odor after unboxing and not too wrinkly either. Seems like a decent affordable dress
customer_reviews.author: jacqueline Radzwion

customer_reviews.title: ... a baby shower and I think this dress is beautiful!! I got an XL my measurements are ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a baby shower and I think this dress is beautiful!! I got an XL my measurements are 42-38-45 and I regularly wear size medium or large shirts and 16 pants. The slip under is a bit flimsy but it's okay. The mid section is loose and I could've probably gone a size down, the arm straps could easily tear off, butttt I still it's cute.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Rosales

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to love this dress--and did so on the model and other ...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this dress--and did so on the model and other reviewers; however it didn't work for my body type. I ordered a size medium (my normal size) based on reviews, but it was far too tight on my chest and arms. I returned it and sized up, hoping the large wouldn't be too big and it, too, was too small. I've returned both. My chest is a bit large but arms are proportionate to body, so I'm surprised other reviewers haven't encountered the same issues. Since the material stretches, it did "fit" but not comfortably, and it didn't look good. The quality, itself, is good for the price and--as other reviewers stated--it was not sheet.
customer_reviews.author: Duchess79

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful design
customer_reviews.text: I really liked how this dress fit me. I bought the medium size and I am 150 lbs 5' 2". The white color has a thin, white skirt so it's not transparent. Only thing I say needs improvement is the stitching on the sleeves and the fact the cut is so high it opens as you walk.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary

customer_reviews.title: Not great in wind but very GORGEOUS
customer_reviews.text: I get compliments like 5 times every time I wear this. But! The slip is a little sheer so if it’s windy or you know, you’re at the beach or something you have to constantly make sure your goods aren’t showing. But it is a GORGEOUS dress and I honestly get people stopping me on the street asking where I got it from every time I wear it and I posted a pic of it on fb and multiple friends asked where I got it
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Used this for my maternity photoshoot and we loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Scottin Westover

customer_reviews.title: Buy this dress... its beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this dress to replace a similar but cheaper made version of a dress that I purchased from forever 21 2 years ago. I love the cut, fabric, and comfort of this dress sooooo much. This was priced really well and it looks beautiful. I'm so happy I ordered it, now I just need a reason to wear it lol. Oooh btw I'm 5'5" 117 lbs with large bust and a small fits great.
customer_reviews.author: Penelope

customer_reviews.title: Woman's floral off-the-shoulder dress
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'2, 200lbs.. thick in the stomach and arms. this product fit me very well except it was tight around my arms, because they're thick no fault to the seller. I really couldn't see my stomach area because of how the dress flows. This dress has a sheer under liner that is just good to have with it. Happy Shopping
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: A must have!
customer_reviews.text: Love, Love, LOVE this dress. I have the white, and beige. Will be ordering the burgundy next. I wore it last night for my 23 wedding anniversary. I got compliments plus, I turned every head (men and women) in the restaurant. This is a must have. So elegant, yet sexy too. Looks so expensive yet it’s not. Very good quality. Here’s a picture of me. What do ya think? Be nice. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Cheri D. Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Pretty light summer dress!
customer_reviews.text: I reordered this dress in a smaller size. I am 5'4 and about 136lbs, I originally ordered a Medium, but when I tried it on it seemed pretty big and loose around the midsection. I felt like it looked big on me. I reordered the dress in a small and it fit much better even though it's not a tight fit now either. I gave the other one away to a friend and she loves it! It's a pretty light summer dress!
customer_reviews.author: Viola

customer_reviews.title: Was not a huge fan of the material/runs VERY small
customer_reviews.text: The dress and the style was cute, but it was cut a little small. It did look a tad bit cheap. I personally did not like the material either. It was a little rough, and I prefer something softer and more flowy. I did end up returning the dress. •if you found this review helpful, please let Amazon know by clicking the helpful button down below! Thank you !
customer_reviews.author: Felici

customer_reviews.title: Fits awkwardly at arms
customer_reviews.text: The dress was very beautiful and true to color, but it did not fit as expected. I followed he size chart and ordered a Medium. The arm bands were very smal and in an awkward place to move about comfortable, and the material that starts under the rouging of the top kind of sticks out a little before it falls so it made me appear pregnant. I never ended up wearing because it was tight on the arms but too loose under the stretchy material, but may try it on again with a belt of sorts to hold down the puffy seam because I really like the color and style.
customer_reviews.author: L. J. Fletes

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Quality as expected for price paid, but not too bad! Overall happy. Shipped very fast! I ordered a medium, am 5'7" with long legs...fits well other than being a teeny bit short.
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: Great for summer
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'1" 140lbs I ordered the medium and it fit nicely, I probably could have still gotten a small but wanted to be safe because I want sure how the sizing was on me. The arm cuffs are a little snug but not a bother. The length in back slightly drags on floor but with a wedge or small heels it's fine. I am shorter so for someone taller it probably won't touch the floor at all. The skirt underneath is more shear see through material I wish that was more solid. Overall it seems nice and light for summer or any warm days. Pretty wine color with the florals.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Scratchy material but pretty
customer_reviews.text: I really like the dress but I'm not in love with it. The materials a little scratchy but the design is so Pretty! Also, there's a slip in the dress so thats a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Hope

customer_reviews.title: Size xl
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I cant say how see thro it will be when outside because I haven't been outside in it yet...but in the house it isn't see thro at all...I was hoping the slip would have been shorts but it is a skirt..I plan in wearing white bike shorts under it...all the reviews say the arms are very small so I was planning on just taking them off but they aren't small and I was shocked because I have huge arms..all in all great purchase ...I cant wait to wear it on our upcoming cruise
customer_reviews.author: William Allen

customer_reviews.title: Unlike the photo. Cheap. Uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Unlike the photo in every way except color. It is indeed maroon/burgundy with flowers but other than that... The photo shows a lined dress. This is not lined at all. It is sheer and horrible against the skinn except for a thin peice of fabric over the hips. Unflattering and atrocious. Not sure if these other reviews were paid for or if they switched manufacturers...but this dress is not worth the $ at all!!!
customer_reviews.author: Eva M

customer_reviews.title: I was super excited about this dress
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited about this dress, until i tried it on... The armbands are pretty tight, and the front of it where the stretchy part meets the other part in the midsection area kind of poofs out almost in a weird way making it almost look like I'm pregnant.. pretty sure it is a defect on the way it was sewn. Don't think I'm going to be able to rock this one...😢
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Lovely, lovely, lovely.
customer_reviews.text: So nice. Bought one for my daughter for college graduation cruise gift, loved it so much had to buy one for myself for a trip I’m taking to beaches. Lovely material, proportionately well constructed throughout. I’m not a fan of strapless and particularly of those types of sleeves. However they fit comfortably very comfortably on my daughters large upper arms and on my small upper arms. Has a nice short skin colored slip that covers the panty area. So very well done. I am a 40D breast and it holds well. When I tried this on I just had to have one too. If you’re going on vacation don’t pass this up!
customer_reviews.author: DLP

customer_reviews.title: You Need This In Your Closet
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this dress. The length is perfect and the design with the slit in the front isn’t too revealing. The burgundy color with the flower details are absolutely gorgeous in person. Something that can be worn for dates, concerts, or photo shoots. Perfect for all body types (I have an hourglass figure and a 34G in the bust, there’s plenty of material in the bust area to keep you covered). I do recommend wearing a slip since the lining underneath is a bit short but other than that money well spent. You will look and feel beautiful in this dress. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Dahlia

customer_reviews.title: Cute dress, but comes up very high when you sit.
customer_reviews.text: The dress is cute and hits my ankles at 5'7". My complaint is that the liner that comes attached to the dress is very short, I had to wear a slip underneath to compensate for the shortness of the liner because when I sat down it barely covered my upper thighs and the slit in the dress makes it hard to stay decent while sitting. For me, if I'm spending more time standing up the dress is fine, but sitting down left 90% of my upper thighs uncovered which for church or a wedding left me feeling indecently exposed.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Small chested slim girls, it was no for me
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'3" 110 pounds. I figured the xs would fit snugly given it is stretchy. I really wanted to like it. It was very loose and the top stretchy section was longer than expected, and bunched and creased awkwardly on my slim torso. The length was good. I am very small chested and have slim arms too. This was just overall not a good fit for my body type.
customer_reviews.author: Luckykat

customer_reviews.title: Small, short and scratchy
customer_reviews.text: I’m not happy with this dress. The arms are too tight and look like bandages. I will likely cut them off. The under material is scratchy and rides up. I wish it was soft cotton instead. The overall fit was about a size smaller than I would expect. It fits but it’s tight and I was hoping it would be more loose and flowy. The material for the outside is very pretty and although it’s a lot shorter than the photo shows it falls at a nice length below the knee. The slot isn’t too high but again the under part (because other wise it would be completely see through) is short and not to my liking.
customer_reviews.author: Kellie

customer_reviews.title: I love this dress and received so many compliments
customer_reviews.text: I love this dress and received so many compliments. I got a large. I am 5'7 and 175 pound. Chest size 34-36 GGG. It fit perfectly I added a belt. I cut the sleeves off because I didn't like them. Also the slip underneath is short since my boobs makes the dress shorter so I had to sew the flowy part shut more.
customer_reviews.author: Bryanne

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected!
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit leery when I read some of the reviews saying that this dress was too full in the front, the sleeves fell off, slip not adequate, etc. but I took a chance, because free returns was offered--what's to lose? I found the dress the be just lovely! It fit beautifully (I'm 5'5", 115-125 lbs) and it was long enough to wear with heels if I chose to, but I can also pull it up some in the back and wear with flats. The sleeves appear to be sewn on very well. The slip is short, but adequate. I don't think it's too full in the front, either. I look forward to having an opportunity to wear this!
customer_reviews.author: Tomigurl

customer_reviews.title: Great color, great style, great fit!
customer_reviews.text: I have yet to wear this dress (I have only tried it on) but so far I love it! Great color, beautiful design, and it fits well. I have muscular arms and was initially worried that if I bought the size that would fit my midsection and chest best then the arms would be too small, so I bought a large even though I wear a medium normally. The arms fit great and are not the slightest bit too tight, and though I can tell that the body could be slightly more snug, it still looks great and is a comfortable fit. Love the way it feels when the skirt sways as you walk!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Acquaye

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: Just got my dress delivered! I was having a hard time choosing between the small and medium. I went with small. I’m 5’1” ish and about 130 pounds. Large chest. It fits SO PERFECT! The top part is the very stretchy material so that’s awesome. As mentioned in other comments, the sleeve elastics are tight for sure but not to the point of being extremely uncomfortable. I’m super excited to wear it out! I also want to say that I feel the dress itself is not tight fitted, I wouldn’t say it runs too large but if you can fit in a small in some dresses, you can def fit in a small for this dress!
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: depends on your style
customer_reviews.text: i ordered this dress not realizing how revealing it would be. I thought the slit was at the side, and some leg would show. however, the dress i received had the opening right at the front, and looked more like a high-low dress. the slip is SHORT and my underwear nearly showed on a handful of occassions. it's cute, and i enjoyed wearing it in mexico on the beach, but i dont think i would wear it anywhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: If you have tiny arms, a long torso, and long legs, this will be great for you
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this dress. It looks beautiful on the model and on some of the other reviewers. I guess it just wasn't meant to be for me. I am 5'3, 135 lbs with toned arms and D cups. I ordered a size small. The dress was too long with too much fabric in the midsection for my taste, yet the arm holes were SUPER tight. I also didn't like how much of the dress was that scrunchy fabric, which went down well past the bust which kind of made my chest blend down with my middle. Awkward. I would order a size up, but then the midsection would definitely be too big. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: K Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Pretty dress if you have a small waist or curvy body
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love the dress! It’s actually a really pretty pattern but it’s just not right for my body type. I’m 5’6” tall 145 pounds, 34B chest. It’s very tight in the top area but I hold most of my weight in my stomach. I have a straight figure, not curvy. My arms are actually pretty skinny and the arm things are very tight. Overall it’s an awkward fit for my body type. I think you have to be either very curvy or just have a skinny waist for it to look good. It’s pretty though, just not on me.
customer_reviews.author: WoodlandFairy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful & Affordable
customer_reviews.text: This dress was so much better than I expected. Amazon dresses are often hit or miss. But this one was great. I ordered my usual size and it fit like a glove. It was light and breezy so perfect for spring and summer. It seems pretty durable too since I was very adventurous during my photoshoot and the dress wasn't damaged at all. I have a pear shaped body and it can often make clothes shopping difficult. But I think this dress would be flattering on all body types. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor R.

customer_reviews.title: Nice and flowy!  Great for a beach or cruise vacation!
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'6" and 119 lbs and I bought a size small. I have skinny arms so the sleeves fit fine but the rest of the dress fits a little loose on me. I possibly could have gone with an extra small but it wasn't available. I still like it very much. The dress is beautiful and flowy which is exactly what I wanted. The slip is a bit big so I'll probably sew it a lot tighter so it doesn't fly up - it hits about mid-thigh on me. The dress length at its longest is about ankle length. The color and fabric is perfect for my beach vacation.
customer_reviews.author: Katydid

customer_reviews.title: Size up if you want to for extra room at sleeve
customer_reviews.text: It is a struggle to know which is the front because there's no tag. This is my 2nd time ordering it, the first time I ordered a M and it was too snug on my arm. I ordered an Xl and it fits better. You could order a size up if you want. I ordered an xl because I'm pregnant. The sleeves part makes me worry because I feel like it can be ripped off but I could still use it as a tube top dress. I'm 5'0 , 38B, 140 lbs but small chested and curvy hips/butt.
customer_reviews.author: Mia Benavides

customer_reviews.title: SO FREAKING CUTE
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about this being to good to be true. Most items that look this cute online are not as they appear, but nope!! This was JUST as pictured and absolutely adorable!! Got so many compliments on my birthday, I bought in white. I am 5 foot, 189 pounds, DD chest and carry most of my weight in my stomach - so I don't like form fitting items too much. This fit was perfect because it was tight around the boobs and looser around the stomach! It was a little long on me because i'm so short but I didn't even care! Too cute to care about the length lol. I bought in an XL.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri

customer_reviews.title: Nice but flawed
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and everyone is right, there is some strange bunching in the center where the elasticized fabric meets the flow fabric and the criss cross aspect. Also, the under/slip part is VERY short. If it was any shorter, it would be indecent. I am tall but 2 more inches of fabric would go a long way. The arm pieces did not bother me. 5'11" 130lbs
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Compliments galore!
customer_reviews.text: This dress was exactly what I wanted to attend a wedding. I felt absolutely beautiful! I’m 5’7” and weigh 155-160 with a 34DD bust and a long torso. I ordered the XL only because the large wasn’t eligible for Prime, but the XL was. The attatched half slip is pretty short and I feel like the xl was maybe actually a good choice for the extra length. I really love this dress and think I am going to get a lot of life out of it.
customer_reviews.author: rebajay

customer_reviews.title: It's Lovely!!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful fit and looks great. The back doesn't drag on the floor and has the perfect length I wanted (5'2). Fits me in the chest area (36D), but it smushed me in a bit. I would have liked more room in chest area, but it's not enough to stop me from wearing it. I just have a lot of cleveage. Lovely off the shoulder look. Waist fits as expected. I bought the tan and it's just gorgeous! Lightweight. I bought a L after looking at the reviewer's photos. Had no problems with ordering or delivery. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'6, 34c, and about 145 lbs kind of athletic build and the medium fit. It is a very cute dress, the sleeves are a tiny bit uncomfortable but not terrible. Do watch out for armpit fat poking out of the top though, I had this problem. And also at some angles I felt like it made me look pregnant/chubbier, the waist isn’t super flattering. I think it would be better if you could put some kind of belt around it to make the waist tighter because I couldn’t have gone down a size the arms would have been too tight and I’d also spill out the top more. I’ll still wear it I think despite all that.
customer_reviews.author: L Block

customer_reviews.title: nice maternity dress
customer_reviews.text: bought this dress for my maternity photos. I am 5 ft tall and 7 mo pregnant. i bought a medium and it fit nice but the stretchy part is a bit longer than i thought. the small would have been too tight around my arms. did step on the back of the dress a little when not in heels because it was a tad long. beautiful color that looked great in photos.plenty of space for the bump. can't really see the bump unless you hold your belly. the fold in the center was strange but if you make sure to smooth it out before holding your belly then it looks fine.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Huizenga

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Flowy
customer_reviews.text: This was an really nice dress, unfortunately I didn't pass the stretch test with this and I returned it (I refuse to stuff myself in clothes and just because it has elastic in them). The arms were a tad bit tight, looked like I shopped at the Baby Gap lol. I'll wait until I lose about 20lbs before trying again, I'm sure at that point it'll be flattering. Overall the quality felt nice, and it looked exactly as described in the pics. Nice and flowy, can't wait to repurchase!
customer_reviews.author: E & J Push'n wind

customer_reviews.title: Get it!
customer_reviews.text: This dress is everything! I am 5'3 around 165lbs & a medium fit perfect!! It was tight on the arms but you couldn't physically tell too much!! When I first opened it I didn't think I would like it because it looks so cheaply made but it looks amazing in pictures & I got so many compliments and love the way it compliments my body in photos!!!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely stunning!!!
customer_reviews.text: I really wish I sized up, but I will make this work. This dress is so beautiful and for the price? It was a steal! It’s not see-through at all either. The little sleeves are fairly tight on me and so is the top part but other than that, it fits great!! Btw I got a Small and I’m 5’0 and around 130 lbs, a medium would’ve fit better probably though.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: One Star.... Here’s Why....
customer_reviews.text: I LOVED this dress. It fit so nice. It was comfortable. And so pretty. I bought it in the Maroon color. I wore it two times in less then a month. And one of the sleeves fell off!! I literally moved my arm (while wearing the dress at a wedding) and the right sleeve just fell off. I had to tuck the left sleeve into the dress and make it look like a halter dress. So sad one of my favorite dresses just broke like that.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: No regrets. Good deal.
customer_reviews.text: I love the dress. I got a large and it fits just perfect. Not tight. And I'm short (5ft. 0) and it wasn't dragging behind. It's put together good but I am worried about the wear and tear to the sleeves over time or when it comes to washing it. But it's a gorgeous dress that can be dressed up with heels or casual with some cute sandals. Not see thru (I got the wine colored dress)
customer_reviews.author: Bianca Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Big around the waist
customer_reviews.text: I love the pattern and the quality material of this dress, however, it does run big. I bought a size small; I’m 5’3, 127 lbs, there was a lot of extra fabric around the waist making my waist and hips appear bigger from the extra material, which would make a suitable maternity dress. I would suggest going down a size. Overall it’s a comfortable dress, the top half is stretchy, it is not see through, top quality.
customer_reviews.author: Britney

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t even reach my ankles and I’m only 5’3”!
customer_reviews.text: OK so I bought this dress because I loved the color and the reviews were great. A lot of people said the dress was long and they even had to have it. I thought it would be long on me too, nice and flowy Because I’m only 5 foot three. Needless to say, this dress was above my ankle LOL! Probably the worst thing I’ve ever bought from Amazon.Will definitely be returning this as soon as possible. Very disappointed. My sister and I had a good laugh when we compared how the model looked in the picture with her long flowy dress compared to the one that I received.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, one of the best thing that I ever bought at amazon!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! So worth buying this amazing dress, in fact I want to get another one ( different color) next summer, the dress is beautiful and exactly like the picture, I am 5'3, 115 lbs and it fitted me perfectly with high heels! The quality is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: E.A.

customer_reviews.title: Summer dress
customer_reviews.text: High/low came just above the knee (I’m 5’8”) with a swooping low at ankle length which laid close to the body. Enough fabric to be full and flowy when walking and an attractive drape when sitting. A smooth undergarment helps with less-than-soft material. Attachment of sleeve is minimal allowing for various adjustments.
customer_reviews.author: sheila

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Fit! I'm 5'2" 210lb 💖 Wedding Dress
customer_reviews.text: Very light textured material but not in a bad way. Largest size fits well surprisingly for me - 38DDD 210lb 5'2". It's the perfect mix of sexy sweet elegant that I needed to pair with my witchy tulle cape (also from Amazon) for my November 1st small backyard wedding. So in love with this dress. I've bought and returned 10+ dresses trying to find the one and this was it. ❤️
customer_reviews.author: A. V. R.

customer_reviews.title: Senior photographer
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my senior closet that senior girls borrow for their shoots. This has not yet been chosen by any senior girl. Tells me that it is not trendy enough for young women. I have it in gray and white also and those have been worn multiple times. I think its the burgundy they are not liking.
customer_reviews.author: mk

customer_reviews.title: I have every color! Great for summer heat!
customer_reviews.text: I own these dresses and just about every color. I buy the extra large size I am 5 4” and I weigh 169 pounds. I Get compliments on these dresses where ever I go. The only complaint I have is that the sleeves do you get ripped or come to touched overtime and pretty easily if you’re not careful. However for the price it’s still a beautiful dress for summer. The material is nice and flow he and comfortable and it goes a little bit above my ankle.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Bonnett

customer_reviews.title: Honest review.
customer_reviews.text: This dress is beautiful and the fit is good, however it is see through and the slip underneath is extremely short and the arms are tight fitting. Given I have chunky arms I kind of expected. I can make it work but there’s probably better out there. Very price friendly though so if you don’t mind buying a slip for it it would definitely be worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Bloxham

customer_reviews.title: Stunning!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this dress! Got it for our honeymoon on the beach and it was breathtaking. I got so many compliments and I felt so elegant walking down the waterside with my new husband. Keep in mind the skirt is very high if you’re tall. I’m 5’5 so it didn’t bother me too much but even then it was pretty short when I sat down. Also quality is nice and durable. Im 130lbs 35in bust, 27in waist and 34in hips and I got a small. Hope this helps!
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful dress—itchy material
customer_reviews.text: It’s a gorgeous dress, but snug around the bust area. After trying it on, I feel like it looks unflattering on a girl like me (with big titties lol). The material is also kinda itchy. I ordered a medium, which is usually what I wear. I don’t have large hips or booty, so it fit fine in those areas. I’m a 38 D and probably could have managed a large, but I don’t have time to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: SO IN LOVE WITH THIS DRESS!
customer_reviews.text: THIS DRESS IS PERFECT! Super beautiful and absolutely stunning on almost every body type! I ordered a small and it fits perfectly!! You could literally wear this dress anywhere! The beach, a nice summer night, school/work, a wedding, a day out with the girls, anything! I’m wearing this to the lights festival next month and I’ve honestly never been more excited to wear a dress (I am not a dress person AT ALL so this is really saying something!) The quality for the price is outstanding!!! I’m probably going to try to find excuses to wear this everywhere. Absolutely in love with this!!
customer_reviews.author: bobby queener

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Vacation
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this dress so I can get a kick start for vacation which is months away, The first dress I ordered had a defect on one of the arm sleeves, it was barely attached, however I returned for an exchange and the shipping on the new dress was super fast. This dress is adorable. I can't wait to wear it on vacation.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey H

customer_reviews.title: Love the dress, just order your normal size.  Don't size up!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cute dress, but I recommend ordering your normal size . I normally wear a size small (5'7" 123) , but after looking at reviews, decided to go for a medium. This was a mistake because for me, there was just too much material at the waist area. But I totally recommend the dress if you get the right size. The cute little sleeves fit me fine. It's actually a very very cute dress and just like the photos.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Susan PWD

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it if you're short !
customer_reviews.text: The dress print is gorgeous, first and foremost. I am 5'1 and usually wear a large in dresses (bust size), but i ordered a medium and it fit right, except the length. Even with 3 inch wedges, it still dragged on the floor. The slip under the long skirt is too short. if I pulled it down to make sure my bum isn't showing, it pulls down the full top as well. So if you're short, don't get this dress unless you are willing to spend $ for alterations. Otherwise, its a good choice. Sad it didnt work out for me
customer_reviews.author: Alex A

customer_reviews.title: This dress is MY FAVORITE!!
customer_reviews.text: This dress is MY FAVORITE!!!!!!!!! I have worn it multiple times since it arrived. It's cute for outdoor or backyard get-togethers, date nights, family celebrations, you name it. You can dress it up and make it look really special, or you can throw on a denim jacket and a cute necklace and sunglasses to make it more casual. Super happy with it! Just don't make the same mistake I made: I thought the front and back were identical, so I threw it on and walked out the door -- only to realize the back has a fairly high slit that DEFINITELY blows open when you wear it backwards lol xD
customer_reviews.author: lalwill

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I wore this for my engagement photos, & it was perfect! I bought a size Medium but the top could’ve been more roomy, so you can buy true to size or even size up if you have a bigger chest (I’m a 36B) For reference I’m 5’1. Check out my Instagram for more outfit pictures! @gabyaida
customer_reviews.author: Cece

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this dress
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this dress!! Ordered it for engagement photos and I could not be happier. I searched and searched for days trying to find the perfect dress and came across this one online! I was skeptical at first because the price was too good. But when I received it and tried it on, I was blown away! I'm 5'2, 120lbs. Ordered a small. Fits great! Only reason I am not giving 5 stars is bc where the bottom of the dress meets the top in the mid section, it ruffles up and flares out making my hips look bigger than they already are. But that is not a deal killer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Size small was large on me- cheap looking and feeling
customer_reviews.text: I have a 32DD bust with 25 waist. The small was too large on me. The smocked area should definitely fit since my bust is on the larger side. The waist area wasnt fitted at all either. The fabric felt very cheap, even forever 21 has better quality fabric. I wouldnt purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sara T

customer_reviews.title: Buy the dress!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful dress! Used it for family beach pictures ☺️ This first picture is how it arrived. The bottom was verrrryyy wrinkled, but I just dampened the bottom a clean water spray bottle and put it in the dryer for a few minutes; took them right out without causing any issues to the dress. My only issue is that I’m small chested so even with a small there some extra material, you can’t really tell just something I felt and noticed. Would definitely recommend and wear again!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Guillermo

customer_reviews.title: White is sheer on top
customer_reviews.text: It's a cute dress, fits fine ( 5'9" 147lbs ACup/ Bust:34 Waist:27.5-28 Hips:37). Arms are snug but comfortable. Only Down size is that the white is sheer on top.
customer_reviews.author: BeachTy

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This was amazing dress. I wore it on vacation and got many compliments.
customer_reviews.author: berriberri90

customer_reviews.title: ... this 5 stars because it is very cute and super well made
customer_reviews.text: I gave this 5 stars because it is very cute and super well made. As for size the arms do run small I ordered up a size because of the reviews I had read about the arms running small. Ordering up a size was great as far as the arms fitting properly however the waist is a little to large as a result. I will be keeping it only because I am extremely good with a sewing machine and did alter the waistband.
customer_reviews.author: Celeste McLean

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful dress
customer_reviews.text: First off, this dress is beautiful. I got so many complements when I wore it! It flows beautifully and is very flattering. It was a little tight to me going with my normal size but sizing up would be too big. I'm 5'3 and it was a bit long without heels. All in all this dress was a good purchase and I'm very pleased. I look forward to wearing it again in the spring!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah D

customer_reviews.title: Just ok. Fits small.
customer_reviews.text: The length and overall size of this dress was smaller than expected. It’s pretty, but kind of a cheap itchy fabric. I removed the arm pieces because they were itchy and too tight. It’s ok as a beach cover up or something. I will use it.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I read all the reviews and decided to go ahead and order it. I got it in white and it’s beautiful. Not sheer at all. It is a little high on the cut where it shows off your leg but I like that about it. I went with a Large (the recommendation said a large for a tighter fit or an XL for a lose fit) and it fits just right. I usually wear a XL or 16 clothing. If you’re thinking about ordering just do it! I wish it came in more colors lol
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia R.

customer_reviews.title: It’s a lovely dress for any occasion
customer_reviews.text: This is a lovely dress especially at this price point. It as a half lining and it’s split up the front. It is slightly wrap over at the front so there are no worries with the split. The material is like a crepe fabric so it’s nice and lightweight for the summer
customer_reviews.author: sandra russell

customer_reviews.title: Flattering and fun!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for Elizabeth Swann disney bounding and felt so cute all night! Easy to dress up or down. I’ll wear it many times. Not high quality fabric but I expected that for the price. Great cut to it, but the arms are pretty tight. Comfy, cute dress. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kate Watson

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Such a beautiful simple dress. One of the few items I've purchased online that exceeded my expectation!
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Cute but with flaws
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute dress with some flaws. First you have to wear layers under. My bra was seethrough so I had to put on an undershirt. My underwear was also a little seethrough so I put on a pair of white shorts. The wind was raising the dress a lot as well.. The only place I would wear this dress again is probably at the beach. I felt too exposed while wear it to walk around town. Also it was difficult to accommodate the dress, having to put on so many layers underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Great summer dress.
customer_reviews.text: This dress is beautiful and fits very well. I added a waist belt to make it a bit more flattering. The bust/torso area and sleeves are very stretchy and fit well, without sliding down. They slightly itch, but overall the dress is very comfortable and fun to wear. For reference: Height is 5’3”, 140lbs, average build.
customer_reviews.author: vinthachai

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Typically I would be a small but I followed the size chart and ordered a medium due to my chest size. I’m glad I did because it fit perfectly. Very well made, looked great in my engagement photos. Other reviews complained about the mid section area and stated they needed a belt but it was fine for me.
customer_reviews.author: JSanford

customer_reviews.title: Short people beware
customer_reviews.text: If you are short, then don't bother. It was very much made to flatter those of us who are taller ( AKA definitely not me at 5'2") Was told it looked like a metamorphosis l maternity dress on me by multiple people.
customer_reviews.author: Hetal Patel (@firesidecoffeebooks)

customer_reviews.title: The skirt underneath can ride up
customer_reviews.text: I have long legs, I am 5' 7'' and wear a 34C bra. I got a size medium. I wore this to the Houston Rodeo and my only complaint is when you sit down, brace yourself for your bare legs showing and the slip riding up. It kept getting annoying to have to cover my legs up so I didn't flash the people around me. Even when you're walking, your legs are showing since the slit is cut pretty deep.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Great dress. Very pretty.
customer_reviews.text: I received the dress pretty quickly, which was great. I expected the material of the dress to be kind of cheap, but it really is good material. The dress looks super pretty on. I ended up getting an XL and it fits perfectly. I'm 5'5 175lbs with a DDD cup chest. I definitely recommend this dress to anyone who has a special event to go to or if your going on vacation, it's very light and airy.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous about the material and length of this dress as I’m short and didn’t want it to be see through. The material is thin but the perfect kind of flowy thin for summer, it’s very light but does not look cheap in any way. The length is perfect, without shoes is just at my ankles which is crazy because I’m 5 foot and that never happens. I love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy E

customer_reviews.title: A little extra fabric
customer_reviews.text: I got my dress 2 days after delivery day but its okay since its raining here. I love the dress its cute floral and the right color. But i deducted a star because like other buyers i do find that there is extra fabric in the mid section. I will upload pictures later. Note: I wear size Large in shirts and medium in bottoms/skirts or size 8 in jeans.
customer_reviews.author: Wolfie

customer_reviews.title: Transparent top half !!!
customer_reviews.text: The top stretchy portion of the dress that fits over your busy is transparent. I dont see how we can wear this without adding more layers when it is supposed to be light. Definitely returning the product. May work in other colors, but the white one is totally flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: komuravelli nagaraju

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I am 5’7” and weight 205 lbs. I got an XL which fit perfectly. The sleeves were a little snug but not uncomfortable at all. The top is a little sheer if you get a lighter color so I would recommend a bandeau. I bought it for my bridal shower and it’s perfect!! So cute and summery, definitely flattering.
customer_reviews.author: Annemarie

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful dress
customer_reviews.text: What an excellent purchase! First, the fabric is incredibly comfortable but sturdy, too. It's a beautiful wine color. I bought an XL. I was concerned that the bust would not fit, as I am busty (34G) but wear 8/10 in jeans. The bust of this dress is actually pretty stretchy, but does not look obnoxiously stretched out. The only thing that would make this dress better was if the slip inside was longer, as it barely touches the edge of my bum and slit goes pretty high up.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Jungwirth

customer_reviews.title: Terrible cut
customer_reviews.text: The cut is terrible. Arms are tiny, bodice is large and the inner lining is twice the size in width that it should be! The arms are cut for a small the bodice is at least XXL on a size large. I’m 5’9”, 140, ordered a large. It was not flattering at all and I’m an hourglass figure.
customer_reviews.author: TABolton

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit well
customer_reviews.text: I am a medium to large women t shirt for the fit in the bust only. And this dress I ordered based on the measurements and it was too tight around the bust. The waist line cut across the bust. It is made for someone with a chest size of b or a. I ordered the xlarge. I would return it but just going to give it away instead. Very pretty print and the cotton blend was nice. Wish it fit.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Rothweiler

customer_reviews.title: The bottom fabric is easily wrinkled since it's not chiffon type of fabric
customer_reviews.text: I guess it's because I have a broad chest, the top part looks unflattering on me. The stretchy top is tight and cuts circulation on my arms. The bottom fabric is easily wrinkled since it's not chiffon type of fabric. The split in the dress is actually in the middle when I thought it was more on the side and the slit isn't straight down but rather rounded in the middle; which I do not like and I wasn't looking for. Overall, I didn't like it and have a found a similar style that's way more flattering for $5 than this price for this dress.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fit Nice but See Through
customer_reviews.text: Totally See Through!!! I tried nothing under, i tried white and nude colors underneath and you can see EVERYTHING !!!! Totally cute but defiantly something you wanna be have cautions about.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Balewski

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect for maternity pics!
customer_reviews.text: Dress was perfect for maternity shoot. HOWEVER!!! Your nips will totally show through bahaha so wear some pasties like I had to. But overall the dress was great. I don’t love the style of the top like the bandeau stretchy style ever because I feel like it makes your boobs look sad and droopy b to it worked in this instance for baby belly stuff and it was light weight and flowed just right and didn’t fall Off after I got it wet in the waterfall etc. worked great for what I needed it for but it is see through in the top.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Rodriguez Linville

customer_reviews.title: Nope. Just nope
customer_reviews.text: This product STUNK! I could smell it from the packaging. The dress mostly fit right except the sleeves. Idk whose arms those are for, but I don’t consider myself a very large woman and those bad boys were tight!! Overall just not very flattering for me and I will be returning it. I’m sure a skinny tall woman could rock this dress.
customer_reviews.author: Roy crew

customer_reviews.title: Loved this ! Long and good quality
customer_reviews.text: I am 5”4and about 119 pounds and I got a size small and I am glad I did because it fits perfect. I bought this for a cabana party but I think I will take it on my vacation trips it’s a perfect length
customer_reviews.author: Denise

product_meta.title: SVALIY Women Floral Off The Shoulder Split Chiffon Maxi Beach Dresses Wedding Party
feature_bullets: Feature: Off the shoulder ,Strapless ,Floral print, Front slit ,Elastic Sleeve , lining inside,very soft ,cool in this summer,match with a choker will make you more flattering
Occasion:beach,casual wear,wedding,cocktail , club , party and evening etc.
